## Overview

The goal of race is to predict the race of a surname. This package uses U.S. Census data which says how many people of each race has a certain surname. From this we can predict which race is mostly likely to have that surname.

## Installation

``` r
To install this package, use the code
install.packages("race")


# The development version is available on Github.
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jacobkap/race")
```
